thread.title: Jury convicts Pierce County man of killing his fiancee in 2014
thread.title_full: Jury convicts Pierce County man of killing his fiancee in 2014 | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Jury convicts Pierce County man of killing his fiancee in 2014
text:
A Pierce County man has been found guilty in the 2014 shooting death of his fiancee, whose body was found in a secluded area near Belfair.
The News Tribune reports that the jury chose to convict 42-year-old William Grisso Thursday of premediated first-degree murder in the death of 45-year-old Nancy Gardner.
Grisso had reported his fiancee missing in June 2014. Detectives later found Gardner's body near Belfair with gunshot wounds.
Prosecutors in the case had argued that Grisso killed Gardner because he wanted to begin a relationship with another woman.
Grisso's attorney maintained that there was no evidence connecting his client to the crime.
The jury deliberated for less than a day before finding Grisso guilty. His sentencing has been set for November.
